Although the quality of BASF products is undeniable, and the support offered by the local team (quality and commercial) is satisfactory, I suggest some changes in terms of the company's posture regarding requests linked to national product quality laws.
 Since it has a considerable market in Brazil, it is necessary to adapt to Brazilian legislation, meeting the requirements of ANVISA (or sometimes MAPA) regarding the analyzes and parameters required in the RDCs, IN and the like. I understand that BASF's international production and quality parameter meets, in theory, the requirements of the Brazilian body. However, the lack of "evidence" leads the client, many times, to opt for other manufacturers, which provide the information, reports, certificates, methodologies and statements required by these institutions.

5 for the only serious reason we had recently with BASF. We had a quality problem with low density and curing of the Polyol material where we had two lots contaminated in our process, which ended up in the assembly line. Basf supported us technically very well Mr Tadeu followed the online tests and confirmed the origin of the problem, however Basf left something to be desired in the dynamics of replacement responses with Donaldson. It was an extremely stressful process because I didn't feel the commitment to solve the problem in restocking the new batch.
 Several obstacles were created for the customer as the BASF system is completely plastered for this type of customer support.
 Another factor taking into account this same problem is the same BASF department where they need the Invoice to request transport for non-conforming material removal that is taking up space and generating another inconvenience for their customer. In my view, as I had informed the number of drums and the weight, it was only necessary to schedule the removal of the material with your supplier because the NF Donaldson removal process does not take more than 24 hours.
 More critical was the dynamic line-stop support with Donaldson.
 But I would like to emphasize the good technical support work that Tadeu Nicodemus Ribeiro has been doing with Donaldson. Every time we needed his support he was always helpful and punctual with his customer.
